reviews.review_text:
Great Service, ambience and presentation. Food is good but on a pricier side.
The kingfish Fry was okay at best.
Veg Biryani was delicious.
The veg starter we had (don't know the name of the dish) was also good.
Parking space is limited though.

The space along with interiors and the ambience of spice mantraa is definitely a talk about üíØ

The food was ' good ' but not something that matches to the expense it costs !

We tried:
Tandoori potatoes :300/-
2/5‚≠êbaby potatoes that were marinated and cooked in the tandoor , which gave it a good tandoori flavour !

Achari chicken tikka : 350/-
2/5 ‚≠ê chicken was not perfectly cooked though !

Chicken bhuna masala w cheese garlic naan :
475/- & 150/-
4/5 ‚≠ê the combination was great , and flavours and aroma  of bhuna chicken was worth trying it !

We also tried their Loaded nachos 4/5 ‚≠ê
And chicken biryani 4/5 ‚≠ê

The one thing everyone talked about which made me personally go there was the dessert that is ;.
Chickoo ensemble : 300/-
4.5/5 ‚≠ê for sure the chickoos didn't disappoint ! Chickoo is anywhich ways my favourite , and added that to a dessert and making it even sweeter would surely never go wrong ! A must try for all chickoo / dessert lovers !

Spice Mantraa is definitely a must  try place if you are in candolim or nearby beach area. It is located on the first floor of YU hotel- known for its extraordinary look and cozy ambience. Some of the must try dishes here are Tandoori chicken black sushi roll, smoked Butter chicken, chicken Bhuna, Nawaabi Murg biryani, Sungtaanche Chilli Fry with some amazing cocktails like Beer Mojito and Modified Manhattan. Do visit.
